Description:
Great Location
This charming red brick home is sure to tick all the boxes. The home features 3 bedrooms, a spacious open plan lounge with gas heating, updated kitchen with room for a dining table, a central bathroom, and car carport as well as a single car garage. Other features include private front yard, Tas oak hardwood timber floors under the carpet. Situated in a convenient court location opposite to park opposite Corio Shopping centre, close to medical clinics, schools and lots more. The home represents excellent value and is an ideal property to add to your portfolio. Call now to arrange your inspection!

Description:
Secure this property today.
Whether you're looking at securing your place in the popular Corio market or adding to your portfolio, this brick veneer residence is one you won't want to miss! If position, convenience and value are at the top of your checklist, then this is the one for you. Enjoy the warmth and character of this solid family home, sitting on approx. 532m2 of land. Comprising of comfortable lounge upon entrance that leads through to the spacious kitchen. 4 generous bedrooms are located down the hallway with the master, complete with WIR, close by the central bathroom and laundry. This property has a large front & back yard with plenty of room to entertain guests as well as DLUG and tandem carport. Just minutes to the Goldsworthy Reserve, public transport and Corio Shopping Centre, the location offers most major amenities within easy reach. Be sure not to miss out! Call now to book an inspection.

Description:
Ripper investment or first home
Don't delay on this one, set close to Ring Road, schools, parkland and bike/walking track, this neat brick veneer home is sure to impress. With its open plan living plus separate family/meals area to the generous galley style kitchen with good bench space and storage. There's 3 bedrooms, a family bathroom with shower & bath plus a good laundry. Outside features include covered pergola area with bbq, secure lock up yard with grass area for pets or kids and a large 8m x 5m garage, ideal for a tradie or car enthusiast. Set on 540m2 approx with good access to amenities this home is the perfect first home or investment. Being sold with vacant possession 30/60 day settlement. Call today for more information.

Description:
A property you don't want to miss.
Introducing this stunning family home situated on a 530m2 (approx.) block of land in a quiet court location in the Cloverdale Estate, this is one property not to be missed. Currently tenanted for $320 per week makes this ideal for investors searching for a set and forget home to add to their portfolio. Take a look at the stunning renovations this home has undergone inside and out, all the hard work has been done for you. Offering a comfortable lounge upon entry which then flows through to the generous dining and kitchen area complete with stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher. Three carpeted bedrooms with BIR's are located off the main hall just down from the updated central bathroom providing separate bath and shower. Further features include ducted heating, split system air-conditioning and much more.
Enjoy entertaining outside in the undercover pergola that overlooks the considerable rear yard. Off street parking is assured in the long side drive-way while the single car garage has been converted and transformed into a perfect man cave or studio space. Conveniently located close by to multiple schools for all ages, public transport and with just a few minutes drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, all major amenities are within easy reach and the ring road practically at your door. Don't miss the chance to inspect today.

Description:
Beautifully presented.
In a location that combines peace with perfect convenience, this family home boasting an attractive facade ensures an appealing lifestyle overlooking the Talona Reserve. You'll feel at home the minute you enter this truly charming abode, perfect for families and investors searching for a delightful property that has been lovingly transformed for the new owners to enjoy. Impeccable interiors offering three generous bedrooms (2 with built-in-robes) located close by the superbly renovated family sized bathroom featuring separate shower and bathtub as well as lovely neutral tones. Relax in the comfortable lounge upon entry that contains S/S A/C and ducted heating which flows into the spacious updated kitchen complete with dishwasher, meals area and gas cooking. Outside has been converted into a private oasis ideal for entertaining on the extravagant undercover deck alfresco overlooking the pristine rear yard. The large SLUG is accompanied by the tandem carport provide ample off street parking all situated on a generous 564m2 (approx.) allotment. Ideally positioned within walking distance to all major amenities such as Shell Reserve, Child care centres, schools for all ages and the Corio shopping centre. Located just seconds to the Princes Highway and Geelong Ring Road makes commuting to Melbourne or Geelong's CBD a breeze. Indulge in this wonderful property offering an easy and convenient lifestyle, homes of this standard are hard to come by ensure you enquire today.

Description:
Think Big – Think Development!
A sensational opportunity to secure a property set over 862m2 of land, with the potential to renovate, extend or redevelop (STCA)
With an established single tandem garage, single carport and generous size outdoor undercover entertaining zone, this could be perfect for a family wanting plenty of space, big enough to add a swimming pool or extra shedding.
Inside the home comprises a formal lounge, gas and electric cooking in the kitchen with open plan dining. All three bedrooms include built in robes and bathroom is complete with shower & toilet.
Additional features including, split system heating/cooling, second air conditioner, ducted heating, outdoor laundry & two rainwater tanks.
In a great location; all the necessities and more at your fingertips, which include schools, public transport, shopping centres, easy access to the Ring Road & with so much happening in the growth corridor, this property offers great potential and a fantastic opportunity.
Whether building and adding to your investment portfolio, rebuilding or adding some TLC and making it into your own family home, this property offers a great future.
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!

Description:
Family Living... With Extras!
If you’re looking for a larger family home in a quiet street, located close to shops, public transport and schools, then this could be the one for you.
This property has the following special features making it perfect for the entertainer or larger families:
• Large carport plus a double length garage with side, roller door access to back yard
• Enormous covered pergola and private backyard, ideal for BBQ's or keeping kids contained
• An outside toilet
• 5kw solar setup
• 3 x Split system heating/cooling
• Polished boards in the kitchen & lounge
• Lounge with lovely northerly aspect overlooking the large enclosed front yard
• Renovated bathroom
• 4 generous bedrooms with a huge master bedroom featuring a new built in spa, ideal for soaking in after a long day or getting away from the rug rats
This neat, brick property would be ideal for a family home or investors chasing a higher return with the 4th bedroom. Phone us now for more information or to book an inspection anytime.

Description:
A Place With (so much) Space... & Style.
On inspection you will be blown away as you step through the entrance to the vast main living space which consist of a generous lounge, with huge dining area and an oversized kitchen. Presented with modern lighting, as new carpets, parquetry timber flooring and the kitchen includes a dishwasher and 900 mm stainless steel stove... not only is it vast, but stunning & stylish. Continue through to the updated bathroom and well-proportioned bedrooms, the home is centrally heated with a split system and features several more modern touches you will be impressed by. You walk towards the rear of the home and you realise this is truly exceptional with a family room that is completed by a gas log heater. Pressing on to a huge multipurpose room large enough to house another family or be the ultimate in entertaining. This huge room leads to the covered entertainment area and also to a large workshop/office space. These areas are ideal for extended family, large gatherings or even someone who works from home (stca). Finished off with double garage (remote access) and large carport plus 2 vast private yard spaces that encompass the 700 + sqm corner site. Possibly a huge redevelopment site one day (stca), as it is conveniently positioned near schools, shops, transport and easy access to the Ring Road... once you see this huge home & allotment, you will need to have it.
Due Diligence checklists are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Space, Comfort, Outstanding Convenience!
A sought-after family focused location, this property is nestled in a quiet court, desirably located to shops, schools and commuter connectivity. The single level beauty ticks all the boxes for your next family home. Superbly set on approximately 721m2 and delivering an abundance of space for the whole family.
Comfortably accommodating, three bedrooms with built-in-robes, well-appointed central bathroom with bath and separate shower. A spacious master zone, that is further enhanced by a functional ensuite.
The light filled kitchen has ample cupboard space and comes with gas cooktop and wall oven. Adjoining the kitchen is the open plan dining, followed by a separate family zone.
Step outside to the hub of the home – the substantial undercover paved entertaining area that enables you to make the most of this zone all year round. This great entertainer is sure to impress!
If its garage space you are after then look no further to this large 10x7 four car garage!
A connecting large driveway with single carport and gate access to the backyard – creating ideal storage potential for a caravan, boat, trailer or any other toys you may have.
Added highlights include, gas heating, split system cooling & heating, ceiling fans in all bedrooms and to entertain the kids outside offers a swing set and monkey bars.
Here's a fabulous opportunity for the motivated buyer to take advantage of a well-established property - perfect for families, Melbourne commuters, first home buyers or investors alike.
With this well-connected location, life will be a breeze - close access to the Ring Road, local schools, public transport and all the amenities you could want and need at your fingertips.
This is an opportunity not to be missed.

The Epitome of Value, Presentation & Location
This immaculately presented family home is sure to please those looking for quality, value & comfort. Exceptionally presented and maintained & offering 4 bedrooms all with built in robes, master with walk in robe, ensuite & split system cooling. Formal lounge, dining, kitchen with gas cooking, electric wall oven, dishwasher, large family room and separate dining area opening out to the huge pergola/outdoor entertaining area with built in bar and cafe blinds offering all year round use. Single lock up garage with access through to large double car garage with extra workshop & storage space with power. Boasting updated bathrooms, ducted heating, roller shutters & awnings, low maintenance gardens & garden sheds & more, this home is truly one with all the hard work done. Move in & enjoy.
Immaculately Presented

Description:
Pick me.
Boasting prime position in the Cloverdale Estate, this charming brick veneer home offers the astute investor an ideal addition to their portfolio. Situated on a large 612m2 approx. parcel of land and currently rented for $320pw to lovely tenants, this is one property not to be missed. Offering a comfortable lounge upon entry which flows through to the generous dining and kitchen. The master suite complete with WIR and ensuite lies at the rear of the home while 2 further bedrooms with BIRs can be found at the other end of the residence adjacent the bathroom. The wide side drive way allows off street parking in the tandem carport which continues through to the secure SLUG.
Enjoy entertaining outside in the undercover pergola that leads through to the considerable rear yard. Conveniently located close by to multiple schools for all ages, public transport and with just a minutes drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, all major amenities are within easy reach. A solid start or savvy investment with ample room to update and add equity over time, don't delay and enquire today.

Description:
A truly breathtaking find.
Set across a generous 596m2 approx. allotment this well maintained property is the ideal choice for growing families. A spectacular display of contemporary design revealing unique fittings and fixtures at every turn. This striking four bedroom home in the Rose Park Estate is a breathtaking find! The master suite is located at the front of the residence boasting S/S A/C, large WIR and ensuite. The three additional bedrooms (all with BIRs) and study are situated towards the rear, close by to the gleaming central bathroom. Moving down the main hallway, you'll find a generous formal lounge that opens into the central living area which is overlooked by the stunning kitchen
with stainless steel appliances. An extended rumpus room provides access to a well-sized rear yard perfect for pets or kids to enjoy. The secure DLUG provides off street parking and internal access to the property. Enjoy swift access to the Geelong Ring Road, Hendy Reserve and Corio Shopping Centre which is just a 2 minute drive away. Boasting multiple living zones, ducted heating and a well thought out floor plan this could be exactly what you've been waiting for. Currently rented at $375pw to wonderful long term tenants, ensure you don't miss your opportunity to inspect this wonderful property.

Description:
Solid investment in growth area.
Situated on a generous allotment of 557sqm (approx) this 3 bedroom home is waiting for its new owner to renovate, develop (STCA) or leave as is with the property currently being tenanted at $255p/w. With a spacious, open plan kitchen, dining and living area, ducted heating, split system heating and cooling for year round comfort. The double garage has a workshop area and there is a separate garden shed.
Located within walking distance to schools, shops & public transport. Only 5 minutes from Corio Central Shopping Centre, 5 minutes to the Geelong Ring Road for Melbourne & Surf Coast commuters and a just around the corner from the Princes Highway. Packed full of potential this comfortable family home is one not to be missed.
Insights: 4 Buangor Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Don't miss the oppurtunity to inspect.
Sitting on an approximately 631m2 parcel of land this delightful brick home is sure to entice an array of purchasers from investors to first home buyers this opportunity is not one to be missed and has something for all. The home itself comprises of a generous lounge and meals area upon entry, 3
spacious bedrooms with BIR's, central bathroom and a practical kitchen with an abundance of cupboard and bench space. Outside includes a single car garage and an additional single carport. Superbly located within walking distance to public transport, Corio Shopping centre and Shell Reserve. Easy access to the Ring Road and with the Geelong CBD is only a 15 minute drive away all amenities are easily accessible. Currently tenanted for $250 pw, don't miss the chance to purchase today!

Description:
Corio's hidden delight.
This beautifully presented family home set on approx. 569m2 is perfect for a first home buyer or investor alike. Immaculately presented frontage with manicured front yard. The house comprises of 3 bedrooms, master bedroom with built in robe with plenty of storage space. A central bathroom has a shower and single vanity perfect for the family. Great kitchen with cupboard space which then leads out to the open plan dining area. A large lounge area accompanied by a ceiling fan. At the rear of the property is a large shed which also has ample storage space. A top of the list inspection is definitely a must. Don't miss the chance to buy today!
Insights: 34 Howitt Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Bring The Family, The Boat, The Caravan, The Lot!
Set on a generous 756m2 block, this property offers fantastic family living with a huge four car garage, set behind a large carport to accommodate a further four cars. The floorplan consists great sized formal lounge with wood fireplace, spacious updated kitchen and meals area, including dishwasher, gas stove and electric oven. The central bathroom includes a corner spa bath and separate shower and the home provides ducted heating and evaporative cooling for your all year round comfort. Outside boasts an enclosed undercover entertainment area and huge backyard, with plenty of space for the kids or pets to run around. Located close to schools, shops and transport, this is an opportunity not to be missed for investors and families alike!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 6 Dunraven Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Rare opportunity - 6 individually titled units!
This rare opportunity to purchase a set of six units on approximately 1213sqm presents the successful buyer with the ability to secure their financial future! Individually titled and metered, the generous 1-bedroom units offer strong rental returns. Each property features spacious open plan living and functional kitchen layout with upright stove and breakfast bar overlooking a private courtyard. A combined bathroom/laundry with courtyard access and carport provides added convenience. Superbly located within walking distance of shops, parkland and public transport, and easy access to the Ring Road make this windfall yours!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
